summary: Utility module that supports LiteLLM proxy management endpoints by providing helper functions for cache invalidation of API keys, customers, teams, and users, adding team members, retrieving default internal user settings, wrapping management endpoint calls, and sending alerts.
business_intent: Enable reliable internal management of customers, teams, users, and API keys within the LiteLLM proxy by maintaining cache consistency, standardizing request handling, and notifying on management actions.
